name: Outside (itch) (parityb1t)
description:
A zombie shooter. Have fun :)

Features:
Some sort of a story
Some sort of guns
Some sort of bullets
... There's explosions and screenshake

Leave some comments, let me know how you don't like it ;)

Controls:
WASD to move
Mouse to point and Left Click to shoot
Esc to Pause
Right Click to use your special ability (once special gauge is at 100%)
